title: WATCH: Border region finalist talks about Pride of Britain experience
text:
Dumfries fundraiser Michael Pattie was invited to the glitzy Pride of Britain Awards in London, as the Border region's winner.
Find out what the man, who's raised more than Â£300,000 for charity, made of the event:
